website_summaries.verdict: The Pioneer Elite SP-EBS73-LR is, hands down, the very best-sounding bookshelf/surround speaker we've heard in its price class.
pros: Pioneer's Dolby Atmos-enabled Elite SP-EBS73-LR speaker has the best sound we've heard from any stand-mount speaker in this price class
It has a three-way design with a 5.25-inch woofer, plus two sets of 1-inch tweeters, mounted concentrically in the middle of 4-inch midrange drivers
cons: Treble forwardness can expose poor recordings
It looks like it may be some time before you'll be able to use the SP-EBS73-LR's Dolby top-mounted Atmos driver

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SPEAKERS!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! amazing sound! so much quality here!! works great with my Pioneer ELITE VSX-LX302 Receiver! Dolby Atmos sound is just out of this world! great for music as well, I do recommend them! just get a good receiver. Will get all the Elite SET for a full 5.1.2 setup
customer_reviews.author: Francisco -

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, my novice friend came over to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker, my novice friend came over to my place and we were watching a movie and I had the previous version of the Andrew Jones speakers and when he heard a portion of the movie and then knew I had different speakers. There is a big difference between the versions and its worth the upgrade and I bought 4 and put the older jones speakers in the bedroom. Wait for sale or a great deal, I paid 200 to 380 for the 4 speakers. Ebay and Amazon combination.
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I'm no expert audiophile. I'm not sure what hertz and dB are the most optimum. But what I do know is that I like the sound that comes out of these speakers when I play the movies in my home. The sound is crisp and clear. I am very satisfied with these speakers. I use it as my front speakers and they are plenty loud.
customer_reviews.author: MarcoPolo

customer_reviews.title: Walts TV sold me a first class product.
customer_reviews.text: I received the product with a missing part. I contacted Walts TV and they responded swiftly. 5 Stars to Walts TV. The speaker is just what I had hoped for. I am delighted with this product. The sound quality is superb. Every thing else is in the right place. Thank you Walts TV. James K. Bryant
customer_reviews.author: James K. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Two speakers in one.
customer_reviews.text: Dolby Height and Surround speakers - one unit - designed by one of the greatest in the business - Andrew Jones. On a budget don't pass them up. I have 4 (8) and that covers front and back height pairs for surround.
customer_reviews.author: David Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speakers
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy my new speakers. I purchased a complete home entertainment system for myself for Christmas. These speakers have really boosted my enjoyment of the system's audio. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: 911 Fellow

customer_reviews.title: Glad they took my money.
customer_reviews.text: Got it today, All I can say is awesome gives such richness to dialog. made really well and are hefty.
customer_reviews.author: Danny  Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding speakers for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: when connected the speakers for first time and listened to high quality music test, I was fascinated with the quality... all the instruments sound very natural and with great fidelity... if you connect these speakers to your home theater, you will be not disappointed. The atmos feature is a plus but dont expect a full atmos experience as the speakers reflect the sound to the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Josetron

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer Elite speakers are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Finally completed my Pioneer Elite speaker system. I couldn't afford them at MSRP, but have no problem owning them when they were sold new at clearance prices!! Definitely a win-win situation!!
customer_reviews.author: Arnold K.

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: They sound great for both music and movies. I really like the Atmos effects as well.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Great right/left main speakers for home theater.
customer_reviews.text: Sound amazing. These have the ooomph to handle the front left and right chores for your home theater, especially when paired with the excellent center channel speaker. Music sounds great, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy with these speakers
customer_reviews.text: I think that pioneer had more resources to offer Andrew Jones. The quality of these speakers tell the whole story
customer_reviews.author: J. Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: 100% Legit
customer_reviews.text: For Jazz, Latin, Blues, Instrumentals, and female voices, these speakers are exceptional when connected to quality High Current Amps or receivers. My Marantz SR5011 Receiver is a very good match for these speakers. However, when I connected a Rotel 1572 Integrated Amp, I could not believe my ears. The sound, sense, and scale completely blew me away. If you’re into hip-hop are R&B, Consider getting a quality subwoofer to augment the base, or purchase the floor-standers, SP-EFS73-LR. I have them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Regi

customer_reviews.title: Pounds
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a monster. Only problem is there are comparable subs out there for less but if you have to have it match your current setup like I do the extra cost is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JClark

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Atmos and Surround quality
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough great things about these speakers. Hands down, better than movie quality surround sound and Atmos theatrics.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great boom for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent & and powerful low end sound with perfect adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy H

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad I got these speakers, great sound
customer_reviews.author: Ron M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great build quality, great sound..... powered through a Pioneer Elite VSX-LX101
customer_reviews.author: GrdianFX

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY SOUND
customer_reviews.text: THESE ATMOS SPEAKERS BY PIONEER ARE PERFECT FOR ANY ATMOS SET UP. GET YOURS TODAY. YOU WON'T REGRET IT.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Walter B Nice

customer_reviews.title: Small Footprint with Big Sound
customer_reviews.text: Loving these speakers!! With the matched center channel and subwoofer, you get yourself one hell of a home theater setup. Give them a try. Highly Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: kleve1972

customer_reviews.title: Poor  packaging, subject to damage very easily.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t even use packaging for the speaker. That says it all about Andrew Jones and pioneer. $400- for one. I regret this purchase deeply.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Luizzi

customer_reviews.title: These speakers have a full rich detailed sound to them
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have a nice detailed sound to them you hear every little thing like a live recording of a rock concert you also can hear the audience in the background
customer_reviews.author: darren

customer_reviews.title: Cool new speakers
customer_reviews.text: Very clear surround sound the speakers on the top emit a clear added surround sound and the other speakers add in rich bass and clear crispy highs
customer_reviews.author: Josh norman

customer_reviews.title: Great sub at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Cant put in words what this sub sounds like. Phenomenal sound...easy to hook up and adjust
customer_reviews.author: Bud H.

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Solid sub for the money. Completed my set up and could not be happier
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: These replaced a pair of Walsh 5 speakers that were just too large, physically, for my apartment. These are fantastic sounding while being used with the television and internet radio. I've yet to try out a couple of my reference CDs for a judgment on its bass reproduction. I had to buy them stone cold as the local Best Buy listed them for sale but did not have them in stock. I read all the reviews and agree that these are a steal, so far, for its price range.
customer_reviews.author: tomwindc

customer_reviews.title: Solid Center Channel
customer_reviews.text: The Pioneer Elite SP-EC73 is pretty big. After spending all my dinero on a nice Receiver I didn't have cash to outfit the rest of my Home Theater... I had to put boards underneath my flat screen so it could clear the top of this center channel. This is a clear sounding speaker that I have yet to really listen to with the dial on 11. It is built solid and the speaker cover is removable (I'm sure that's a standard)
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: my first pioneer speakers
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker , it has great sound and fits perfectly with my andrew jones front speakers. I've had Pioneer receivers for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: To my surprise! A perfect speaker for a 4ohm receiver!
customer_reviews.text: The midrange is well balanced with the tweeter and woofer, creating a powerful all around presents!
customer_reviews.author: Rick O

customer_reviews.title: Love these speakers
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers. My theatre system is in the basement. My ceiling is not high enough for the full Atmos feeling but the speakers still sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... extra high priced so-called "elite" speaker systems at the Best Buy Magnolia store
customer_reviews.text: Andrew Jones (Pioneer's speaker designer) assassinated all of those extra high priced so-called "elite" speaker systems at the Best Buy Magnolia store.. Words cant explain how high quality these speakers are when paired with the SC89 receiver. It's worth the money, but don't go cheap on the receiver..
customer_reviews.author: A.L

customer_reviews.title: I've been a fan of Pioneer receivers since the late 60s and it's nice to have a speaker that reflects that tradition
customer_reviews.text: I had placed a pre-order for the Elac Uni-fi floor model but prior to its release date I ran across a CNET comparison of the two models and the Pioneer came out ahead when it came to music reproduction (which is the majority of my use). I've been a fan of Pioneer receivers since the late 60s and it's nice to have a speaker that reflects that tradition.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: Could not Be happier
customer_reviews.text: Got the entire setup. 4 (SP-EBS73) book shelf, 2 (SP-EFS73) floor standers, 1 (SP-EC73) center, 2 (SW-E10) subs, the SC-97 receiver and Onkyo M-5010 2-Channel Amplifier. For a 7.2.4 surround sound (7 surround, 2 subs, and 4 Atmos channels). This System for the price sounds amazing. I hear sounds I never heard before. And complemented they system with the Logitech Harmony Elite Remote Control. I cannot be happier with this setup. Side note Vudu has Atmos demos for you to stream for free so you can show your friends in 1-2 min clips how cool your sound system is.
customer_reviews.author: Deathdealer83

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Atmos-enabled speakers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Dolby Atmos-enabled speakers. I did not want to go through the hassle of installing ceiling speakers so I went with the up-firing type Atmos speakers. I have watched "Transformers 4" and "Expendables 3" on bluray with the Dolby Atmos soundtrack. The Dolby Surround Upmixer also sounds great playing regular 5.1 and 7.1 movie soundtracks. The addition of sound coming from the ceiling creates a 3-dimensional sound. There are going to be alot more blu-rays released in Dolby Atmos during the coming months. You can check the Dolby Atmos website for more details. Well worth the upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best speaker at this price, or even twice the price!
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Pionner Elite SP-EBS73 no better than ELAC B6
customer_reviews.text: I received these speaker and plugged to my NAD 3020. Here are my findings: 1. They need a lot of power to sound right. (NAD 3020 is not enough) I used Rotel amp and sound better. 2. To Melow 3. Lock of dynamic 4. Flat sounding 5. Good highs 6. Great clarity 7. Good for orchestra, no great for pop music. There are better speaker a better price. ELAC B6. I have those and sound much better and more dynamic. ELAC FU-5 Should be the same as this... don't botter buy them go for ELAC B6.
customer_reviews.author: Yashin Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Tweeter on right channel never worked from the start😔
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these last week and right out the box i hooked them to my reciever and my right speeker mod range tweeter does not work on one side. The other speaker is fine but i cant even stand watching a movie with it so unbalanced. I hope you can help me with this problem amazon because that is a lot of money for such a high end product not to work properley. I love the speakers but this needs to be fixed. Please help....
customer_reviews.author: alexander

customer_reviews.title: Too bad Atmos is dead, I really like these.
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker, totally pointless considering Atmos currently has less support than Betamax and Laserdisc. Seriously, there's 5 movies out in Atmos on Bluray and besides John Wick the rest are atrociously bad. Uselessness aside, the sound coming out of these is HUGE. They say they're 'bookshelf' speakers but they weigh like 25 pounds each and sound like a million bucks. Just wish there was material to exploit their functionality or an option on the Elite SC series that would allow you to just bang some sound out of them for increased atmosphere. Unfortunately unless it's mixed in Atmos, they stay off thus rendering them 'money wasted'. If there's a non-Atmos version of these, buy 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

product_meta.title: Pioneer Elite SP-EBS73 Andrew Jones Home Audio Bookshelf Speakers, Dolby Atmos Enabled (Set of 2)
product_meta.description: Style:Bookshelf LoudspeakersPioneer Elite SP-EBS73 Andrew Jones Home Audio Bookshelf Speakers. From speaker designer Andrew Jones comes a collection of speakers that bring professional-quality sound to your living room. These highly-acclaimed speakers delivers on sound, creating an immersive listening experience. The Elite Bookshelf Speakers are suitable for use as main or front-channel speakers and rear-channel speakers in the most sophisticated surround-sound or music systems. FEATURES: Dolby Atmos Enabled. Coherent Source Transducer reduces interference. Direct and reflected sound arrives at listening position with identical timing and timbre. 3-way speaker design represents each major frequency. Complex Crossover blends audio between the woofer and tweeter.
feature_bullets: ANDREW JONES. From speaker designer Andrew Jones comes a collection of speakers that bring professional-quality sound to your living room. These highly-acclaimed bookshelf speakers deliver on sound, creating an immersive listening experience.

PRECISE SOUND. Coherent Source Transducer reduces interference between midrange and tweeter, controlling sound directivity at all frequencies. This ensures that direct and reflected sound arrive at the listening position with identical timing and timbre.

THREE-WAY SPEAKER. A true 3-way speaker design means each major frequency band is represented with a separate driver. The high-frequency, midrange and low-frequency drivers help deliver balanced sound for a better listening experience.

DOLBY ATMOS. Ideal for either main front-channel or rear-channel speakers with Dolby Atmos, these speakers bring new life to traditional soundtracks and music too, putting sounds into motion and reproducing the full impact of the artist’s work.
COMPLEX CROSSOVER. Complex Crossover perfectly blends audio between the woofer and tweeter for greater accuracy.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars123 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
